name: market for furnace, pellets, 25kW | furnace, pellets, 25kW | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4103/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'furnace, pellets, 25kW', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the product of a pellet furnace. It has a capacity of 0.025 MW, a lifetime of 20 years and a lifetime capacity of 4,380,000 kWh. The process includes the most important materials used for the fabrication of the furnace, their decommission, energy and heat for the construction and the decommission of the device. 

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
